top5Deals.description:
Let those pesky, roving neighborhood gnomes know where they're
    not welcome. (A series of big-budget, narratively lackluster sequels not included.)

Just because your building doesn't allow pets doesn't mean
    you can't enjoy the company of a furry friend—albeit a not-so-animated one.

Nothing quite relieves stress like popping a cute little
    emoji-faced bean out of a pod—right?
